subject: Basketball
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
lead_paragraph: Adam Silver, the N.B.A. commissioner, must protect the league’s image, but he also must not appear to mute the voices of the league’s athletes or stifle their social activism.
snippet: Adam Silver, the N.B.A. commissioner, must protect the league’s image, but he also must not appear to mute the voices of the league’s athletes or stifle their social activism.
